original_text: These were they that were numbered of the families of the Kohathites, all that might do service in the tabernacle of the congregation, which Moses and Aaron did number according to the commandment of the Lord by the hand of Moses.
korean_text: 이는 모세와 아론이 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 회막에서 종사하는 고핫인의 모든 종족 중 계수된 자이니라

sentences.original_text: These were they that were numbered
of the families of the Kohathites
in the tabernacle of the congregation
which Moses and Aaron did number
according to the commandment of the Lord
